concept.title: 23.000 Scope.

conbody.p: This part prescribes acquisition policies and procedures supporting the Governmentâ€™s program for ensuring a drug-free workplace, for protecting and improving the quality of the environment, and to foster markets for sustainable technologies, materials, products, and services, and for encouraging the safe operation of vehicles.
